panels.title: Used Capacity

panels.title: Total Capacity

panels.title: Error Rate

panels.title: GET Throughput

panels.title: Unavailable K8s Nodes

panels.description: Count of total unavailable proxies in the cluster
panels.title: Unavailable Gateways

panels.description: Total unavailable targets count
panels.title: Unavailable Targets

panels.description: Total AIStore requests per second
panels.title: Requests / Sec

panels.description: Mean target request latency for GET requests over the selected interval
panels.title: Latency

panels.description: Current AIStore PUT Throughput
panels.title: PUT Throughput

panels.description: Count of physical machines in the cluster
panels.title: Total K8s Nodes

panels.description: Count of total proxies in the cluster
panels.title: Total Gateways

panels.description: AIStore target replica count
panels.title: Total Targets

panels.description: Mean busy state of all CPU cores together

targets.expr: avg((sum by(instance) (irate(node_cpu_seconds_total{instance=~"^$node$",job="node-exporter", mode!="idle", cluster=~"${cluster}"}[$interval])) / on(instance) group_left sum by (instance)((irate(node_cpu_seconds_total{instance=~"^${node}$",job="node-exporter", cluster=~"${cluster}"}[$interval])))) * 100)

panels.title: CPU Busy

panels.description: Mean 5m load average
panels.title: Load (5m)

panels.description: Mean RAM usage
panels.title: RAM

panels.description: Total number of CPU cores
panels.title: Core Count

panels.description: Identifies the pod within the AIS namespace that has the lowest uptime
panels.title: Uptime

panels.description: Total RAM
panels.title: RAM Total

targets.expr:
sum by (bucket) (
  rate(ais_target_get_bytes{node_id=~"$target", cluster=~"${cluster}"}[$interval])
)
/
sum by (bucket) (
  rate(ais_target_get_count{node_id=~"$target", cluster=~"${cluster}"}[$interval])
)

panels.title: Average GET Object Size by Bucket

targets.expr:
sum by (bucket) (
  rate(ais_target_put_bytes{node_id=~"$target", cluster=~"${cluster}"}[$interval])
)
/
sum by (bucket) (
  rate(ais_target_put_count{node_id=~"$target", cluster=~"${cluster}"}[$interval])
)

panels.title: Average GET Object Size by Bucket

names: ais_target_disk_util {__name__="ais_target_disk_util", cluster="aistore-asr-iad", disk="nvme6n1", instance="10.244.0.82:51081", job="aistore", node_id="JpMOijtg", tenant="anonymous"}

panels.description: Total cluster storage used and free
panels.title: Storage Used vs Free

panels.description: Top five storage-using disks and nodes, as % full

targets.expr: topk(5, (100 - 100 * sum by (instance, device) (node_filesystem_avail_bytes{instance=~"^${node}$",job="node-exporter",mountpoint=~"^/ais/.*",fstype!="rootfs"}) / sum by (instance, device) (node_filesystem_size_bytes{instance=~"^${node}$",job="node-exporter",mountpoint=~"^/ais/.*",fstype!="rootfs"})))

panels.title: Storage Used: Top 5 Disks

panels.title: AIStore Error Rates by Operation

panels.description: Disk error rates, broken down by node
panels.title: Disk Error Rates By Node

panels.description: Total receive and transmit cluster network throughput
panels.title: Total Network RX / TX

panels.description: Top 10 chattering nodes.
panels.title: Network RX / TX: Top 10
